QueryDefinition.Query:
with e_p as ( SELECT encid ,ep.provid ,provider_role ,specialty ,case when lower(provider_role) = 'attending' then 0 else 1 end as is_attending ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition by encid ORDER BY case when lower(provider_role) = 'attending' then 0 else 1 end, provider_role, specialty) sort_index FROM {sc}.encounter_provider ep join {sc}.provider p on p.provid = ep.provid ), e_p_filtered as ( select encid, provid from e_p where sort_index = 1 ), a as ( select cast(replace(v.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, v.ptid, v.visitid, v.visit_type, v.visit_start_date, v.visit_end_date, v.visit_start_time, v.visit_end_time, e.encid, ec.provid, cast(replace(e.encid, 'E000','') as bigint) as VisitOccurrenceId, row_number() over (partition by v.visitid order by e.interaction_date) as ordinal from {sc}.visit v JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND v.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE join {sc}.encounter e on v.visitid = e.visitid LEFT JOIN e_p_filtered as ec ON ec.encid = e.encid where e.encid is not NULL and e.encid != '' )
select *, case when visit_type = 'Inpatient' then 9201 when visit_type = 'Emergency patient' then 9203 when visit_type = 'Observation patient' then 9201 ELSE 0 end as conceptId, 'oncology' source_type, '' prov, '' provcat, '' pat_planid from a where ordinal = 1 order by PersonId
